root.name: The Masked Rider: Kamen Rider ZO
root.description: The Masked Rider is part of Sega's "TruVideo" series of games on the Sega CD, and features footage from the Japanese series dubbed over with English voice actors. The game is set over a series of loosely connected stages, and gameplay involves pressing a direction on the D-pad or one of the action buttons in response to prompts onscreen.
